timeline.message:
Squashed commit of the following:

commit 84700748bd089a5f0ab4d7c4efe188bfa845e810
Author: Edoardo Vacchi <uncommonnonsense@gmail.com>
Date:   Mon Aug 3 16:25:18 2020 +0200

    fix health check

commit 3000b66fea3e7aae4908dab3569c732283ce6ee6
Author: Gustavo <gustavonalle@gmail.com>
Date:   Mon Aug 3 12:51:26 2020 +0100

    Make sure the server is started (#6)

commit 8397930791307ca0ae380d8da3882c96d7396649
Author: Edoardo Vacchi <uncommonnonsense@gmail.com>
Date:   Mon Aug 3 09:39:14 2020 +0200

    KOGITO-2922  Bump Infinispan to 11.0.1.Final
KOGITO-2923  Remove unnecessary Infinispan dependencies from bom (#665)

timeline.author: cristianonicolai
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -117,18 +117,18 @@
     <version.io.cloudevents>1.3.0</version.io.cloudevents>
     <version.io.fabric8.kubernetes-client>4.8.0</version.io.fabric8.kubernetes-client>
     <version.io.prometheus>0.5.0</version.io.prometheus>
-    <version.io.quarkus>1.6.0.Final</version.io.quarkus>
+    <version.io.quarkus>1.7.0.CR1</version.io.quarkus>
     <version.io.restassured>4.3.0</version.io.restassured>
     <version.io.restassured.springboot>3.3.0</version.io.restassured.springboot>    <!-- Manually override to 3.3.0 because Spring boot uses rest-assured-common@3.3.0, otherwise error: The type io.restassured.common.mapper.TypeRef cannot be resolved. It is indirectly referenced from required .class files -->
-    <version.io.smallrye.reactive>2.1.1</version.io.smallrye.reactive>
+    <version.io.smallrye.reactive>2.2.1</version.io.smallrye.reactive>
 
     <version.org.antlr>3.5.2</version.org.antlr>
     <version.org.antlr4>4.8</version.org.antlr4>
     <version.org.assertj>3.16.1</version.org.assertj>
     <version.org.eclipse.jdt>3.19.0</version.org.eclipse.jdt>
     <version.org.hamcrest>1.3</version.org.hamcrest> <!-- else old version coming from Mockito wins and breaks tests -->
-    <version.org.infinispan>10.1.5.Final</version.org.infinispan>
-    <version.org.infinispan.image>10.1.5.Final</version.org.infinispan.image>
+    <version.org.infinispan>11.0.1.Final</version.org.infinispan>
+    <version.org.infinispan.image>11.0.1.Final</version.org.infinispan.image>
     <version.org.infinispan.protostream>4.3.2.Final</version.org.infinispan.protostream>

timeline.bodyText: can we keep this in the 0.13.x branch shouldnt prevent the upgrade, right?
timeline.author: cristianonicolai

replies.bodyText: it was conflicting at places with the one from quarkus
replies.author: evacchi

replies.bodyText: let me do another green build without this, I'll merge this one and then try and revert it with another PR (I am having issues locally and I don't understand if they are related to this)
replies.author: evacchi
